sen.j: 鷹司 尚輔（たかつかさ ひさすけ、享保11年（1726年）－享保18年3月6日 (旧暦)（1733年4月19日））は、江戸時代の公家。
sen.e: Hisasuke TAKATSUKASA (1726 to April 19, 1733) was a kuge (court noble) in Edo period.
Hisasuke TAKATSUKASA (1726 to April 19, 1733) was a kuge (court noble) in Edo period.
Hisasuke TAKATSUKASA (1726 to April 19, 1733) was a kuge (court noble) in Edo period.

sen.j: 五摂家の一つ鷹司家の第18代当主。
sen.e: He was the 18th household master of the Takatsukasa family, which was one of the five regent houses (Gosekke).
He was the 18th household master of the Takatsukasa family, which was one of the five regent houses (Gosekke).
He was the 18th household master of the Takatsukasa family, which was one of the five regent houses (Gosekke).
He was the third son of Iehiro KONOE, the chief adviser to the Emperor.

sen.j: 実兄である鷹司房熙（家熙の次男）が21歳の若さで急死した。
sen.e: His real brother Fusahiro TAKATSUKASA (the second son of Iehiro) died suddenly at the young age of 21.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: His real older brother Fusahiro TAKATSUKASA (the second son of Iehiro) died young suddenly at the age of 21.
sen.cmt: 単なる「兄弟」ではなく「兄」であることを明確にします。「若死にする」die youngと訳した方が自然です。
sen.e: His real older brother Fusahiro TAKATSUKASA (the second son of Iehiro) died young suddenly at the age of 21.

sen.j: そのため、わすか5歳で房熙の養子として鷹司家を相続する。
sen.e: As a result, he at the age of only 5, under the name of Fusahiro's adopted son, was inherited with the TAKATSUKASA family.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: As a result he, at the age of only 5, became Fusahiro's adopted son and inherited the Takatsukasa family.
sen.cmt: 「房熙の養子の名義で」ではなく、実際に房熙の養子になったと考えられます。人を主語にしてbe inherited with～は不自然です。家名は頭文字だけ大文字にします。
sen.e: As a result he, at the age of only 5, became Fusahiro's adopted son and inherited the Takatsukasa family.

sen.j: その後、従五位上近衛府に任ぜられる。
sen.e: Afterward, he was promoted to Jugoinojo (Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade) of the KONOE family.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Afterward, he was promoted to Jugoinojo (Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade) Konoefu (the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards).
sen.cmt: 「近衛府」の訳語は用語集を参照しました。
sen.e: Afterward, he was promoted to Jugoinojo (Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade) Konoefu (the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards).

sen.j: しかし、間もなくわずか8歳で病死
sen.e: However soon after then, he died of sickness at the age only 8.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: However, soon after then, he died of sickness at the age of only 8.
However, soon after then, he died of sickness at the age of only 8.

sen.j: 五摂家の歴代当主の中で唯一公卿に昇ることはなかった。
sen.e: He was the only household master in the history of the five regent houses (Gosekke) who did not manage to rise to the rank of Kugyo (high court noble).
He was the only household master in the history of Gosekke that did not manage to rise to the rank of Kugyo (high court noble).
sen.cmt: 先行詞にonlyがついている場合、関係代名詞はthatが原則。また「五摂家」の説明は前に出ているので、ここでは不要です。
sen.e: He was the only household master in the history of Gosekke that did not manage to rise to the rank of Kugyo (high court noble).
